name: GRAPPLE RUN (Teren19)
description:
This is my 2nd game made in godot. I aim to make it a speedrunning game where your time matters and the player has a grappling gun. In the future I aim to add a leaderboard to the game where you can compete with other online players.

UPDATE 1 (as of 17.01.2023)

Added basic movement, map and grappling gun feature.

UPDATE 2 (as of 23.01.2023)

Added lighting, 3 new levels, spikes, a screen that pops up once you die (touch a spike), a screen that pops up once you finish the game and a new player character. Added a timer that displays the elapsed time at the top left corner and at the screen if you win. -> Main game features are now completed.

UPDATE 3 (as of 24.01.2023)

Fixed some bugs that had to the with the collision of the player/spikes.
